alert.note: Alert for Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN AND NORTHWESTERN GRAHAM COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Hoxie, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Sheridan and northwestern Graham Counties, including the following locations... Studley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
